author: Turner Vink

changelog.release_notes:
- Switch to Clay for config page (No more needing an internet connection to change settings!)
- Added manual location option for weather forecast

- Fix date clipping
- Change time and date text colour to black on "Watermelon"

Tons of new features this version!
- Added Russian, Italian, Portuguese, and Ukrainian
- Added colour schemes
- Added option to see battery level as a percentage
- Added Pebble Health integration for step counting
- Added custom weather scheduling, 30 or 60 minutes

description:
If you enjoy Material Ribbon, give it a heart or consider making a donation through the settings page!

Inspired by Material Design, Material Ribbon gives you all the information you need on two "ribbons" that cross the display.

Features:
- Supports 8 languages (English, Français, Español, Deutsch, русский язык, Italiano, Português, український)
- 6 colour schemes
- View battery level as an icon or a percentage
- Set a step goal and view your progress throughout the day


Weather icons from ionicons.com

latest_release.release_notes:
- Switch to Clay for config page (No more needing an internet connection to change settings!)

title: Material Ribbon
